Body: I am having a problem watching embedded videos on certain websites. What happens is that the sponsor of the video plays then it looks like the video will load and play and then it stops everything goes blank. I hope someone can tell me what to do please?I am using (I would assume) the default Internet browser but am a tablet rookie.  Here is a linkhttp://www.csnnw.com/video_content_type/mora-no-drop-oregon-after-loss
Title: rookie samsung user has problem watching embedded videos on certain websites
